sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; import { Container, Row, Col, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const getWelcomeMessage = () => { switch (user?.role) { case 'ROLE_ADMIN': return 'Welcome to the Admin Dashboard'; case 'ROLE_TEACHER': return 'Welcome to the Teacher Dashboard'; case 'ROLE_STUDENT': return 'Welcome to the Student Dashboard'; default: return 'Welcome to the Dashboard'; } }; const getDashboardActions = () => { switch (user?.role) { case 'ROLE_ADMIN': return ( <> Manage Users Add, edit, and remove users from the system Manage Courses Create and manage course offerings System Overview Monitor system statistics and performance ); case 'ROLE_TEACHER': return ( <> My Courses View and manage your assigned courses Grade Management Assign grades and scores to students Course Content Upload and manage course materials ); case 'ROLE_STUDENT': return ( <> My Courses View your enrolled courses and progress Course Registration Enroll in new courses for the semester My Results View your grades and academic performance ); default: return null; } }; return (

{getWelcomeMessage()}

Hello, {user?.firstName} {user?.lastName}!

 {getDashboardActions()} ); }; export default Dashboard;
